title: Douse, Koishite Shimaunda.
original_name: どうせ、恋してしまうんだ。
sinopse:
Surrounded by four good-looking childhood friends, Mizuho's everyday life is full of nothing but heart-racing moments ♡ On top of that... Lately, Kizuki, the youngest among the group, has been drawing in steadfast towards her!? A dazzling tale of youth begins!

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
